name: Scrapbook 2: The Determined Daughter
description:
A short narrative game about cunning, greed and consequences of judging people based on who they appear to be.

Requires a mouse or track pad to play.

Created by Ellen Cunningham

Music by The Dresden dolls
Used with kind permission of Amanda Palmer

Note: There seems to be a problem with the portraits in the game so I recommend that you download the exe file to play.
